metadata.synopsis: The player sits on Ketherics throne. They feel powerful, though their companions are not convinced. .
metadata.how_to_trigger: Sit on Ketherics throne in the execution room after the execution scene is over.Only triggers once, use "oe mooresetthrone" to reset it so it can be triggered again.

2.speaker: Narrator
2.text: *From this seat, Ketheric defied gods and raised an army for the Absolute.*
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Grand shot of Ketheric's hall over the player's shoulder.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Don't get used to it. One taste of regal power might have you craving more.
